migrations.sql: CREATE TABLE migration (migration_id integer NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, version text NOT NULL, sql text NOT NULL, date_created timestamp NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE tasks(ID integer primary key autoincrement not null, INSTANCE_ID  integer, GROUP_ID integer, STATUS  VARCHAR default 'NEW', NAME  VARCHAR, tasktype VARCHAR, DEFINITION TEXT,PARAMETERS   TEXT,CREATEDATE    DATE, STARTDATE    DATE, RESUMEDATE    DATE,ENDDATE      DATE,RETRIES NUMBER,LOG          TEXT)
